item.name: Australian Domaine Wines
item.description: Australian Domaine Wines is a business owned by Ben and Mario Barletta, who started their own brand business for leading Adelaide retailer Walkerville Cellars, which they then owned. The wines are made at Pikes using tanks and barrels owned by the Barlettas. Grapes are sourced from the Clare Valley, McLaren Vale and the Barossa Valley. Exports to the US, Germany, Switzerland, Sweden, France, Japan and Sweden.
